text: Need Nathan King for Domino's campaign. Budget around $3,194, looking for 1 x Behind-the-scenes content, 3 x Instagram post, 2 x 90-second product demo, 2 x 5-minute review, 1 x Twitter post. 7 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs November 2025. Usage rights for 12 months. Engagement period: 2 months. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $3,194 budget
